title: Physics Excellence Program
subtitle: Master Physics Concepts & Applications
description: Understand physics principles through hands-on experiments and expert guidance.

modules.title: Classical Mechanics
modules.description: Study motion, forces, energy, and momentum with practical applications.

modules.title: Electricity & Magnetism
modules.description: Explore electrical circuits, magnetic fields, and electromagnetic theory.

modules.title: Waves & Optics
modules.description: Understand wave properties, sound, light, and optical phenomena.

modules.title: Modern Physics
modules.description: Discover quantum mechanics, relativity, and atomic physics concepts.
